channel.description: Recent content in Useful queries on PHO documentation

item.title: Taxonomy
item.description: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT * WHERE { ?sub <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/TAXRANK_0000004> ?family; <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/TAXRANK_0000005> ?genus ; <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/TAXRANK_0000006> ?species. SERVICE </api/sparql/taxonomy> { } } LIMIT 10
